gold.user: User wants to retrieve the specific IP Access Control List mapping for a given DomainSid and Sid to check its configuration.
gold.ideal: The API should return the details of the specified IP Access Control List mapping, including the associated IP address and any relevant metadata.

gold.user: User intends to remove a specific IP Access Control List mapping from a SIP domain to manage access control more effectively.
gold.ideal: The API should confirm the deletion of the specified IP Access Control List mapping and return a success message.

gold.user: User wants to create a new IP Access Control List mapping for a SIP domain to allow specific IP addresses access.
gold.ideal: The API should create the new mapping and return the details of the created mapping, including its Sid and associated IP address.

gold.user: User needs to list all IP Access Control List mappings for a specific SIP domain to review current access settings.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of all IP Access Control List mappings associated with the specified SIP domain, including their Sids and IP addresses.
